[h1]Logical Operators[/h1]

Use [b]logical operators [/b]to combine conditional statements and return [b]true [/b]or [b]false[/b]. [img id="2456" width="100%"]
The [b]AND [/b]operator works the following way: [img id="2458" width="100%"]
[note]In the AND operator, both operands must be [b]true [/b]for the entire expression to be [b]true[/b].[/note]

Both a and b are false
